name: Foreign Affair by Luciano - Rothschild
additionalNotes: Foreign Affairs is a line developed by Luciano cigars in Estel√≠, Nicaragua. It took more than a year of exploration to reach its final blend that has as its main idea to convey the unique connection that people live between enjoying cigars. As a result we have a variety of cigars with a sweetness, audacity and contradictory flavors that can be enjoyed completely without overwhelming you due to its excellent balance.
